name: Record Technologies
description: An unofficial registry for Kasm workspaces.

workspaces.description: Asciiville provides tools and utilities to generate and view Ascii Art
workspaces.name: doctorwhen/kasm:asciiville

first_launch.cmd: bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y sudo && echo "kasm-user  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" >> /etc/sudoers'

workspaces.description: Chromium is a free and open-source browser, primarily developed and maintained by Google.
workspaces.name: kasmweb/chromium:develop

workspaces.description: Neovim is a hyper-extensible text editor derived from Vim
workspaces.name: kasmweb/neovim:dev

first_launch.cmd: bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y sudo && echo "kasm-user  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL" >> /etc/sudoers'
